Mewdeko Docs

Class StreamRolePermissionException

Represents errors that occur due to insufficient permissions when attempting to apply a stream role within the application.

StreamRolePermissionException(string, Exception)

Declaration
public StreamRolePermissionException(string message, Exception innerException)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string message

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Exception innerException

The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.
